text:
[Verse]
Feet splash on the ground
Raindrops falling down
Laughing out loud
Spinning round and round

[Verse 2]
Hands up to the sky
Umbrellas pass us by
Sidewalks shining bright
Dancing through the night

[Chorus]
We're alive in the storm
Hearts beating so warm
Dancing in the rain
No more pain

[Verse 3]
Thunder in the air
But we don't care
Smiles everywhere
Love is rare

[Verse 4]
Streetlights in a row
City's night glow
Holding you so close
Time moves slow

[Chorus]
We're alive in the storm
Hearts beating so warm
Dancing in the rain
No more pain
title: Dancing in the Rain
